item.trans: adj. 应处监禁的；监禁的；忏悔的（等于penitential） n. 监狱；教养所；宗教裁判所 同义词:jailed, prison, jail Fox River Penitentiary is an old prison .福克斯河收容所是一所老牌监狱。
adj. 灾难性的；损失惨重的；悲伤的 同义词:sinister, sorrowful Leaders of the other parties agree that further delay would be disastrous .其它政党的领袖同意进一步的延期将损失惨重。
vi. 变矮小 n. 侏儒，矮子 vt. 使矮小 adj. 矮小的 同义词:homuncle, mannikin, scrubby, runty She dwarfed all her rivals in athletic ability.她在体育运动方面的才能使她的对手相形见绌。
adj. 来世的；超脱尘俗的 If the checks pan out, expect to hear a lot more otherworldly news .如果这些核对无误，我们就可以准备听到许多来自外太空的新闻了。
adj. 不变的；不可变的；不能变的 同义词:constant, permanent, steady We assume there is immutable about the school year 's rhythm .我们假定学年的节奏基本上保持不变。
n. 鹿肉；野味 Venison is the meat from what animal ?鹿肉是哪一种动物身上的肉？
adj. 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的 vt. 精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物） vi. 详细描述；变复杂 同义词:detailed, full, tailor-make, thicken to elaborate his plans for a new engine精心设计一种新机器
n. 细菌 同义词:microbe, bacilus Both bacteria and viruses can cause it .细菌和病毒都可能导致这种病。
vt. 浏览；吃草 vi. 浏览；吃草；漫不经心地看商品 n. 浏览；吃草 同义词:scan, glance through, page, glance through, lookthrough, scan Two cows browsed the hillside.两头牛在山坡上吃草。
n. 浪荡子；性行为放纵者；放荡不羁者；玩乐者；自由思想家 adj. 放荡的 同义词:debauchee, dissipater, gay, dissolute I lost Ruth and gained an undeserved reputation as a libertine .我失去了露丝，却冤枉地担上了准浪子的名声。
v. 相互关连 vt. （使）相互关连 to interrelate all parts of the system使系统各部分相关联
n. [植] 蕨；[植] 蕨类植物 同义词:Pteridophyta, filicales The fern quickly grew from the earth .羊齿很快地从地里长出来。
n. 抗议；规劝；谏书 同义词:protest, obtestation I eschewed upbraiding , I curtailed remonstrance .我避免责备，少作规劝。
n. 偶像破坏者；提倡打破旧习的人 But he shows little sign of being an iconoclast .但他表现出他是一个信念很强的人。
adj. 紧张的；拮据的；心情焦躁的；易怒的 同义词:intense, stressed But luckily my new boss isn't uptight at all .但幸运的是我的新老板不是那样的人。
adj. 饥饿的；急躁的 同义词:hungry, starved In fact , thinking of them makes me a little peckish . But it 's 2am , so I should …事实上，想到这些食物竟让我感到有一点饿了，不过现在已是凌晨2点，所以我应该（睡觉去）……
vt. 使模糊；使迷乱；弄暗 同义词:fog, befog He obfuscated the problem we argued.他把我们争论的问题搞得模糊不清了。

adj. 罗马教宗的；主教的 n. 主教仪典书；主教祭服及徽章 同义词:episcopal Papal diplomats , all priests nowadays , are trained at the Pontifical Ecclesiastical Academy in Rome .如今教廷的外交官都是牧师，都在罗马的圣座神职学院（PontificalEcclesiasticalAcademy）接受培训。
adj. 颗粒的；粒状的 同义词:grainy Starch : Any of several white , granular organic compounds produced by all green plants .淀粉：数种由所有绿色植物制造的白色、粒状有机化合物的统称。
n. 全景，全貌；全景画；概论 同义词:panoramic view, overall view Is it a panorama ?它是一个全景?。
n. 倾向；素质；易染病体质 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition A practicing forensic scientist has a built -in bias or predisposition toward the prosecution 's side.开业的法医学家对辩方有一种固有的偏爱或倾向。
adj. 有力的；多腱的；肌肉发达的 同义词:male, vigorous, mighty, energetic I admire sinewy prose style .他文风高雅令人钦佩。
adj. 沮丧的，灰心的 同义词:blue, disappointed, depressed A dejected woman in the crowd who scare buy new share .抢购新股抽签表人流中的一位沮丧的妇女。
n. 变迁；兴衰；枯荣；（人生的）盛衰（vicissitude的复数） Moreover , this open-minded approach to reporting and analysis did not apply only to Iraq and its vicissitudes .而且，这种开明的报导和分析方式并不只是用在伊拉克及其变迁上。
n. 护城河；壕沟 vt. 将...围以壕沟 同义词:fosse One MP even allegedly included the cost of having his moat cleared with his expense claims.据称，一位议员的报销单中甚至包括清理水沟的费用。
adj. 爱管闲事的；好干涉的 同义词:managing, snoopy Cereal third transaminase lifts continuously is not meddlesome , you should make further examination .谷丙转氨酶连续升高不是好事，你应该去做进一步检查。

adj. 宇宙的（等于cosmical） 同义词:universal, mundane If the satellite has a tilted orbit , the result is a series of vertical bending waves , an out - of - plane corrugation —small ripples in a cosmic carpet .如果卫星的轨道是倾斜的，就会有一连串垂直的弯曲波，也就是突出平面的皱纹，好似宇宙地毯的涟漪。
n. 小狗，幼犬 同义词:Zergling, purp Can I have puppy , please ?请问，我可以要只小狗吗？
vi. 发生故障；不起作用 n. 故障；失灵；疾病 同义词:get out of order, be out of order, fault, trouble, complaint, sickness If a computer malfunctions, it fails to work properly.如果计算机发生故障，它就不能正常工作。
vt. 没收；拘留；将…关在圈中 同义词:hold, sequestrate to impound stray horses把走失的马关在圈中
adj. 不知疲倦的；不屈不挠的；有耐性的 同义词:patient, tough, tireless, untiring He was indefatigable in his lectures on the aesthetics of love .在讲授关于爱情的美学时，他是不知疲倦的。
n. 领带；领巾，领结 同义词:tie, necktie cravat with wide square ends; secured with an ornamental pin .有宽宽的方形尾巴的领巾；上面别着一个装饰性的别针。
n. 钟学；鸣钟术；铸钟术
n. 男子气；男子特点；生殖力 同义词:masculinity, reproductivity It is a great aid to men with a low sperm count or virility .对精虫稀少或活动力差者，很有帮助。
n. 轶事；奇闻；秘史 同义词:ana He was about to favour us with a little anecdote connected with it , when you entered .你们走进来的时间，他正打算讲段和这有关的逸话给我们听听呢。
adj. 不定的；周游的；错误的；偏离正路的 同义词:false, wrong, improper If the errant husband has the divorce filed in Texas , the tables are turned even more dramatically .如果这位不忠的丈夫在德克萨斯诉讼离婚，这一表格的转变甚至更具有戏剧性。
n. 碎石，碎砖；粗石堆 同义词:crushed stone, rockfill The town has twice been rubbled in battle.这个城镇曾经两次毁于战争。
vi. 高兴；庆祝 vt. 使高兴 同义词:pleasure, be pleased, glad, pleasure, satisfy He often rejoices at other people's misfortunes.他常常对别人幸灾乐祸。
n. 暴行；凶恶，残暴 同义词:enormity, thuggism People were annoyed by his atrocity .他的暴行激怒了人们。
adj. 深情的；充满深情的 He was certainly an affectionate fellow .他无疑是一个富有情义的人。

adj. 潜在的；潜伏的；隐藏的 同义词:potential, hidden, underlying The biases latent in every character , black or white, drive home the improbability of racial reconciliation in America .每个角色无论黑白，都隐藏了种种偏见，清楚地表明美国的种族和解绝不可信。
vi. 屈服；死；被压垮 同义词:to surrender, genuflect Most of us are known to succumb to persuasion through the media.我们之中的大多数人都抵挡不住传播媒介的宣传。
n. 蔑视 vt. 鄙弃 同义词:defiance, snotnose She disdained all my offers of help.她鄙弃我要帮助她的所有提议。

adj. 熟练的；擅长…的 n. 内行；能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, clever, practiced, expert, sharp How many college students in Taiwan are more adept at Internet use and software than they are at human relationships ?有多少台湾大学生们正在变得越来越熟识互联网和软件的使用而疏于人际关系呢？
n. 蝎子；蝎尾鞭；心黑的人 同义词:defiler Always flank with small groups of Scorpion Tanks.总是用小股蝎子从侧翼进攻。

n. 政变；妙计；出乎意料的行动；砰然的一击 vt. 使…颠倒；使…倾斜 vi. 推倒；倾斜；溢出 同义词:inspiration, good idea, invert, pitch, slope, lean The defeat of the coup gave Russia an historic chance to liquidate the organisation .这次政变失败为俄罗斯扫清克格勃组织提供了历史的机会。
vt. 使再生；革新 vi. 再生；革新 adj. 再生的；革新的 同义词:reform, revivify, innovate, innovative, reproductive They were spiritually regenerated by his speech.他们听了他的讲话后在精神上获得了新生。

n. 翻译；表现；表演；描写；打底；（建筑物等）透视图 vt. 致使；表演；打底（render的ing形式） vi. 给予补偿（rendr的ing形式） 同义词:translation, interpretation, description, performance, representation Revenue is the economic resources flowing into a business as a result of rendering goods sold and services during a given accounting period .收入是指在一个特定的会计期间由于销售商品和提供劳务而流入企业的经济资源。
n. 杂乱；蓬乱的头发 vt. 弄乱 同义词:messing, clutter, mess, disarrange His hair was tousled.他头发蓬乱。
n. 铜锈，[材] 铜绿；碱式碳酸铜 同义词:patina, aerugo Verdigris has spread all over that abandoned copper pot.那把已经废弃的铜壶上长满了铜锈。
n. 卖国贼；内奸 v. 卖国；叛国（quisle的ing形式） 同义词:traitor, agent provocateur Jiang Qing said : "Deng Xiaoping is a quisling and a fascist ! ""江青说：邓小平是个一个卖国贼，法西斯。
n. 初次登台；开张 vi. 初次登台 He decided to debut with several other violinists.他决定与其他几名小提琴手一起首次登台演出。
n. 攻击；袭击 vt. 攻击；袭击 vi. 袭击；动武 同义词:attack, attempt, push, hit, come at, descend on, set at to assault the castle on all sides从四面八方向城堡发起突击
n. 阿飞；小流氓 同义词:tsotsi, gouger He was led astray by a hooligan .他被一个流氓引上了邪路。
adj. 邪恶的；穷凶极恶的；不法的 同义词:evil, ill, black, ugly, wicked The EU reckons that Intel's use of such rebates nefarious .欧盟认为，英特尔利用返点促销用意恶毒。
n. 低能者；愚蠢的人 adj. 低能的；愚笨的；虚弱的 同义词:retardate, jackass, weak, moronic Have you noticed that the imbecile always smiles ?你注意到低能儿总是微笑吗？
adj. 矮壮的；健壮结实的 The trimly bearded , stocky Mr Meshal , relaxed and often humorous , plainly thinks time is on his side .这位身材矮壮，蓄着胡子的马沙尔先生语气轻松又不失幽默，显然认为时间在他一边。
adj. 夸张的；颇具野心的 同义词:exaggerative, melodramatic Don't be scared of high- flown language of economists and Cabinet Ministers .不要被经济学家和内阁大臣们的高谈阔论所吓倒。
vt. 降低；使…贬值；掺杂 同义词:lower down, bring down They debased the value of the dollar.他们使美元贬值。
adj. 亵渎的；世俗的；异教的 vt. 亵渎；玷污 同义词:lay, mundane, cloud, unhallow Their behaviours profaned the holy place.他们的行为玷污了这处圣地。
vi. 哀号；悲叹 vt. 为某人死亡而悲痛；哀悼某人；哀号着说 n. 哀号；悲叹；恸哭声 同义词:moan, regret, lamentation That baby wailed.那个婴儿号啕大哭。
adj. 骨的；骨质的 同义词:bony, osteal All patients underwent an elective osseous surgical procedure on the forefoot .所有病人都作了前足的选择性骨手术。
n. 偏心；偏袒；偏爱；癖好 同义词:tendency, preference, favour For the kinder among us did not wish to fret the master , we humoured his partiality .因为我们中间比较心慈的人并不愿惹主人生气，所以我们就迎合他的偏爱。
n. 裸露癖；自我宣传癖；喜出风头癖 Must there be some exhibitionism in desperate need of expression_r ?是不是必须有些潜在的需求需要表达呢？
adj. 天主教的；宽宏大量的 n. 天主教徒；罗马天主教 Critics of the study included an official of the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops .在对研究的批评家中包括了一位美国天主教主教会议的官员。
n. 诬陷，捏造；阴谋诡计 同义词:machinations, factitiousness Why doctor forever does frame-up face answer a question ?为什么医生永远不正面回答问题？
n. 胃蛋白酶 Pepsin Enzyme from a pig 's stomach , used like rennet .胃蛋白酶酶从猪的肚子，想用凝乳酶。
n. [病毒] 病毒；恶毒；毒害 同义词:vindictiveness, Vyrus I talked to you over the computer , and you gave me a virus .我通过计算机跟你交谈，你竟然传染给我一个病毒。
n. 圣地；神殿；神龛；圣祠 vt. 将…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣 同义词:temple, Holy Land, enshrine And for the first time, polls suggest a majority of Japanese are against their leaders shrine visits .并且民调首次显现大多数日本人反对他们的领导人参拜靖国神社。
n. 侮辱；无礼；傲慢 同义词:importance, despite The oppressor 's wrong , the proud contumely .忍受压迫者虐待、傲慢者凌辱。
n. 苦恼；极大的痛苦；临死的挣扎 同义词:unhappiness, vexation Ah , yes , the agony of heartbreak .啊，是的，爱情心碎带来的剧痛。

adj. 有感情的；有感觉力的；意识到的 n. 有知觉的人 同义词:aware, conscious Sure , You fight Evil , but when Was the last time you showed a " concern for the dignity of sentient beings "?没错，你与邪恶作战，但你最后一次表现出“对于生命体的高贵品质的关心”是什么时候了呢？

adj. 灼热的；激烈的；讽刺的；过早硫化的 v. 把…烧焦；严厉批评；切割；过早硫化（scorch的ing形式） 同义词:acute, acid, slitting, excising He says this is particularly unpleasant , as people are forced to endure scorching heat and dust storms.当人们被迫忍受热气的烘烤和灰尘时，这让人特别不舒服。
adj. 友好的；易为人亲近的 n. 伙伴；朋友 同义词:friendly, amicable, friend, partner, comrade, fellow, cobber and Jim , you will bring me one noggin of rum, now , won't you, matey ?'吉姆，去给我拿杯朗姆酒来，好不好，伙计？

n. 分类；任命；神职授任；排成等级 同义词:classification, category, appointment, breakdown Traditionalists have agreed to create an organization to combat liberal trends , such as the ordination of a gay clergy .传统主义者一致同意创建一个新组织来对抗教会变革趋势，如一名同性恋牧师的任命。
n. 忠诚；忠实 同义词:faith, loyalty, devotion In many countries politicians ' fealty to open markets is already more rhetorical than real.在许多国家，政客们对自由市场的忠诚更像是虚浮的废话。
n. 仁慈；善举 同义词:humanity, mercy, kindness, benevolence But he met instead a look of such mild benignity that he was left baffled .可是他看到他的神色竟如此温和、宽厚，使他感到困惑莫解。
adj. 贫困的，贫穷的；紧急的 同义词:poor, urgent, emergency, instant, needy The bishop planned to necessitous areas of the city .主教打算走访城市里的贫困地区。
adj. 抒情的；吟唱的 n. 抒情诗；歌词 The film has a long- breathed lyric pace .本片有著深长悠远，如歌的步调。
n. [军] 后勤；后勤学 同义词:office support It tries to capture the cost of military logistics , rather than environmental impact .它想要控制的是军队后勤工作的成本，而非环境影响。
adj. 极好的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, grand, great Those states have done a superb job of managing their deer , elk and bear .这些州在管理野鹿、麋鹿和野熊方面做的很好。
n. [脊椎] 猎豹 The cheetah is the fleetest of animals .陆地上跑得最快的动物是印度豹。
adj. 快乐主义者的；快乐论的；快乐主义的 It is a hedonistic in there. It is a sexy room , it works.那是个好现象，在这么一个性感的房间里，它确实发生了。
n. 平衡；姿势；镇静 vt. 使平衡；保持...姿势 vi. 平衡；准备好；悬着 同义词:balance, attitude, balance, equilibrize, hang, balance of, get ready The girl poised the glass on the edge of the table.小姑娘把杯子稳稳地放在桌子边上。
n. 雀斑；斑点 vt. 使生雀斑 vi. 生雀斑 同义词:lentigo, ephelis The cream is also proved to be beneficial to acne and freckle treatment .本品也被证明有助于痤疮和雀斑的治疗。
n. 消耗；损耗；放血 同义词:consumption, waste, wear Ozone -layer depletion above the Arctic is not as extensive as expected because of unusually warm weather .因为不正常的暖气候，北极上空臭氧层消耗的范围并不像我们预期的那么大。
vt. 系统化；计划；扼要表示 同义词:propose, design, map, project to schematize the year project用图表说明年度规划
n. 即兴曲；即席演出 adv. 即席地 adj. 即席的 同义词:extemporarily, offhandedly, sight, off-the-cuff She played a tune impromptu .她即席演奏了一曲。
adj. 丰富的；很多的；多产的 同义词:abundant, numerous, productive, full, plenty He did not predict the future in his copious science fiction , he insisted .在他博学的科幻小说中他从没有预言过未来，他坚持这样。
n. 贱民（印度的最下阶级） 同义词:doggery, canaille Shortly Tom came upon the pariah of the village , Huckleberry Finn, son of the town drunkard .不久汤姆遇到了村子里坏孩子哈克贝利-费恩，他是本镇一个酒鬼的儿子。
n. 舷梯；跳板；进出通路；座间过道 int. 让路 同义词:walks, accommodation ladder If you 're hesitant , let 's just chat at gangway before I leave .要是你们难以决定，那就在我离开之前，让我们到舷梯那儿谈一下吧。
n. 二分法；两分；分裂；双歧分枝 同义词:disruption, fragmentation If this dichotomy is maintained what happens to the rate of interest ?如果保持这种二分法，利率会怎样呢？
adj. 精力充沛的；健壮的 同义词:live, energetic, vigorous, restored On the benches in his shop were the lusty and valiant young men .他店内登子上坐的却都是一些强壮骠悍的小伙子。
n. 缩影；摘要；象征 同义词:symbol, abstract, brief, summary, significant The Atom whirls alone , the epitome of singleness .原子独自旋转，形成单一性的典型缩影。
vt. 篡改；插入新语句 vi. 插入；篡改 同义词:tamper with, manipulate, build in, plug in The article has been interpolated.这篇文章已被篡改过了。
n. 借口；托辞 vt. 以…为借口 同义词:excuse, blind He pretexted an early engagement in town the next morning.他借口明天早晨在城里有约会。
n. 憎恶，仇恨，敌意 同义词:hatred, odium His personal animosity towards Mr Thaksin is well- known .他个人对他信的敌意是众所皆知的。

n. 食欲；嗜好 同义词:weakness, habit, hobby Of all the colors in the spectrum , blue is an appetite suppressant .在光谱的所有颜色中，蓝色是一种抑制食欲的颜色。
n. 钳子（pincer的复数）；（虾蟹等的）螯 同义词:clippers, pliers Quick -adjustment Hydraulic System : Quick regulations on pincers & fingers , maximizing machine performance .快速调整型油压系统---爪子及指头等压力调整方便，发挥机器最佳性能。

vt. 使突出，使伸出 vi. 突出，伸出 同义词:exsert, advertise, stand out, excel at He protruded his tongue.他伸出了舌头。
adj. 破坏性的；从事颠覆的 n. 危险分子；颠覆分子 同义词:ruinous His work shows traces of an unexpected subversive sense of humour .他的作品描绘了让人意想不到，极具色彩颠覆的幽默感。
n. 停止；中止；中断 同义词:stop, break, stay, hang, stand The crisis led to a cessation of the hallmarks of Indus elite culture .这项危机导致印度河菁英阶层文化特徵的中断。
vt. 点燃；使燃烧；使激动 vi. 点火；燃烧 同义词:heat, light, burn, light the fire He ignited the stove fire with pieces of wood.他用一些木块燃了炉火。
vi. 规定；保证 vt. 规定；保证 adj. 有托叶的 同义词:to formulate, prescribe, define, undertake, regulate, assure, state to stipulate a price规定价格

adj. 热心的，热情的，积极的 同义词:intense, active, positive, eager, warm This happened in Poland zealous sleaze -hunters of the Law and Justice Party squandered their election win in 2005 .这种情况在波兰发生过，雄心勃勃的公平法制党在2005年赢得了大选便轰轰烈烈的反腐。
n. 契约，盟约；圣约；盖印合同 vi. 订立盟约、契约 vt. 立约承诺 同义词:compact, agreement. They covenanted that their hostages would be present.他们保证他们的人质将到场。

adj. 混杂的；杂乱的 adv. 偶然地；胡乱地 同义词:miscellaneous, jumbly, random, wild, accidentally Their close relatives the meadow voles , by contrast , prefer a solitary , promiscuous existence .相比而言，草甸田鼠-草原田鼠的近亲，则更偏爱独居的，滥交的生活方式。
adj. 垂直的，正交的；直立的；陡峭的 n. 垂线；垂直的位置 同义词:vertical, standing, orthogonal If the first axis is perpendicular to the ground we speak of an azimuthal mounting.如果第一根轴与地面垂直，就称为地平式支架。
n. 拼图玩具；线锯；镂花锯 vt. 用线锯锯 同义词:fret-saw That thousand-piece jigsaw puzzle is too much for a child of her age .对她这个年龄的孩子来说，那副千块的拼图玩具是太难了。

n. 权宜之计；凑合；临时措施；将就 adj. 临时的；权宜之计的；凑合的 同义词:quick fix, provisional measure, temporary, extraordinary, odd, occasional Rebels are forcing tens of thousands of refugees out of makeshift camps .反政府人士迫使成千上万的难民失去临时帐篷。
n. 膨胀，扩张 同义词:expansion, inflation The baby cannot consume enough milk to relieve the distension .婴儿不能喝下足够的牛奶以减轻胀气。
vt. 吸收，吸入；沉浸在（工作或学习中）；使……上下湿透 vi. 浸泡；渗透 n. 浸；湿透；大雨 同义词:absorb, drink in, dip in, sink, drenching, downfall The clothes should soak for a quarter before washing.洗这些衣服之前应浸泡一刻钟
adj. 坚硬的；燧石似的；坚定不移的 同义词:rigid, ironbound In the Chablis region of France , it is the only grape permitted and it renders a " crisp , flinty " wine .在法国的夏布利产区，霞多利是唯一一种被官方认可，而且标记为“清爽，坚硬”的葡萄酒。
vt. 拆除；破坏；毁坏；推翻；驳倒 同义词:destroy, undermine We are going to demolish the old building.我们准备爆破这座旧大楼。
n. 斗剑者；古罗马公开表演的格斗者；争论者 同义词:disputer, controversialist Wasn't it that guy in the Gladiator ?不就是电影《角斗士》中的那个家伙说的吗？
n. 戒酒；节欲；（气候等的）温和 adj. 温暖的；有节制的 同义词:abstinence, nephalism, warm, moderate Exercise , temperance , fresh air , and needful rest are the best of all physicians .锻炼，好脾气，清新空气和合理的休息对身体最有好处。

adj. 突出的；伸出的；招人注意的 同义词:prominent, pointed, highlighted, striking Objective :How distant the condyle moved protrusive and its function importance for incisors occlusion .目的：推导切牙合功能时 ，髁状突向前下方运行的距离及生理意义。
n. 高原；稳定水平；托盘；平顶女帽 vi. 达到平衡；达到稳定时期 同义词:altiplano, high land, level out After initial logarithmic progress growth plateaued sharply.初期的上升进程之后，发展陡然平稳下来。
n. 愤恨，怨恨 同义词:spite, hatred But they will offer more targets for insurgents to shoot at , and reinforce many Iraqis ' resentment of the occupation .而美军将给叛乱分子提供更多打击目标，也将增强许多伊拉克人对美军占领的怨恨。
n. 剩余；[贸易] 顺差；盈余；过剩 adj. 剩余的；过剩的 同义词:residual, spare, remaining, residual, odd When was that old tank surplused out?那辆破坦克是什么时候卖出去的?

n. 饲养；务农，耕种；家政 同义词:cultivation, breeding, soil, feed He imagines " digital husbandry " happening offline in back rooms, so to speak , so that the common failures necessary for evolution are never seen by its customer .比方说，他设想“数字资源管理”在后台脱机，这样的话，进化中不可避免的常见故障就永远不会被它的客户看见。
adj. 有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的 v. 处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向 同义词:prone, liable, conditioned He disposed his money in charity.他将自己的钱用于慈善事业。
n. [分化] 烧瓶；长颈瓶，细颈瓶；酒瓶，携带瓶 同义词:lagena, winebottle The flask culture process was analysed .同时对摇瓶发酵过程进行了分析。
n. 欺诈，欺骗；冒牌 同义词:fraud, deception What are tithes and tricks but an imposition , all a confounded imposture ? -and I can prove it .什么是宗教税，什么是宗教礼节，都是骗人的，乱七八糟的事，我并且可以证实。
n. [昆] 小昆虫；小烦扰 Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .你们这瞎眼领路的，蠓虫你们就滤出来，骆驼你们倒吞下去。
n. 镇静剂；安定药 同义词:goofball, bromo He used nicotinamide to tranquilize the animal.他用烟酰胺使动物镇静。

n. 板条箱；篓 vt. 将某物装入大木箱或板条箱中 Your price is to include packing in crate , and delivery to our warehouse .贵方报价应包括板条箱包装费及到我方仓库的运费。
adj. 通奸的；搀杂的 vt. 搀假 同义词:extramarital to adulterate a language with slang在语言中掺杂俚语
n. 树苗；年轻人 同义词:seedling, young adult The dead elm have is replace by a row of sapling .死去的榆树已被一排幼树取代。

n. 姜；姜黄色；精力；有姜味 vt. 用姜给…调味；使某人有活力 adj. 姜黄色的 同义词:energy, steam, vigor Why don't you steam those lobsters with ginger and scallion now ?你现在何不把那些龙虾和姜，葱一起蒸呢？
vi. 标记；衰退；枯萎 vt. 标记；插旗 n. 标志；旗子 同义词:fail, decay, emblemize, symbol, seal The streets were flagged to celebrate the royal wedding.街上挂起了旗子，庆祝皇室婚礼。
adj. 挥霍无度的；浪费的 n. 挥霍无度的人；浪费的人 同义词:wasted, dissipative Thus the savings of poor Asian farmers have financed the habits of spendthrift Westerners .可怜的亚洲农民的积蓄为西方人挥金如土的习惯垫定了经济基础。
n. 智慧；装聪明 同义词:wisdom, wit I like Yi tian 's sensitive sapience who was from " Apartment ""我喜欢白领公寓中智慧敏感的裔天。

n. 修改，修正；改变 同义词:correction, alteration, changing, revision AMERICAN policymakers have long held that mortgage modification is one of the best ways to tackle the country 's housing bust .一直以来，美国立法者都认为修订抵押贷款是应对其房市低迷最有效的方法之一。
n. 柏油帆布；防水帽；防水衣；涂焦油防水布 同义词:rainwear tarpaulin was spread over the hay -rick and firmly lashed down to prevent it blowing off in a high wind .为防止大风把干草堆吹掉，在上面盖上了一块防水帆布并用绳子紧紧地扎牢。
adj. 奢侈的；浪费的；过度的；放纵的 同义词:luxury, unreasonable Despite this, he was extravagant that he was always in debt .尽管如此，它还是因为太过于奢侈而总是处于欠债当中。
vi. 裂开；分裂 n. 裂缝；裂沟（尤指岩石上的） vt. 裂开；分裂 同义词:gap, seam, crack, split, spring off, rip through Though we all got out to examine fissure , he remained in the car .我们都出去检查大裂缝，但是他留在车里。

vt. 切断，毁坏；使…残缺不全；使…支离破碎 同义词:destroy, damage, cut off Her arm was mutilated in the accident.她的一只胳臂在事故中伤残了。
n. 折衷主义，折衷说 University academic degree, majoring in machinery manufacture or integrated eclecticism .要求大专以上学历，机械制造或机电一体化专业。
vt. 溺爱；纵容 n. 女性化的男人；懦夫 同义词:baby, dote upon, chicken, nancy

adj. 法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的 同义词:mutual, entire, common, collective, universal Every week , profit forecasts for corporate Japan are slashed afresh.每周日本企业的利润预测都在不断减少。

adj. 讽刺的；反话的 同义词:acid, satiric It will be " quite ironic ", he added , to hear that " in a country [ the US ] that is firmly convinced that China is doing nothing to address climate change ".他补充表示，“在一个坚信中国没有采取任何行动应对气候变化的国家（美国）”听到这些措施，将“非常具有讽刺意味”。
n. 掠夺；破坏，破坏痕迹 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting on three days of depredation and one day to escape .埃斯特打算剽掠三天，再用一天时间溜走。
adj. 截短的；被删节的 vt. 把…截短；缩短；使成平面 同义词:curtal, cut, surface He truncated a news item to fit the available space.他删节一则新闻以适合可用的版面。
n. 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱 vt. 把…放入旅行箱内 adj. 干线的；躯干的；箱子的 同义词:stock, bole, arterial Can I put your bags in trunk first ?我能先将你们的包放到后备箱吗？
n. 巨石 There is no way we can know exactly why the megalith builders set the big stones into the ground .我们无法确知为什么古建筑者把巨石嵌入地面。
n. 上当者；易受骗的人 vt. 欺骗；愚弄（等于duplicate） 同义词:greenhorn, sell, fox, kid to dupe someone into doing something哄骗某人去做某事
n. 凉亭；公用电话亭；报摊 同义词:booth, bower He phoned his friend in a kiosk .他在一个电话亭给朋友打了电话。
adj. 整体的；巨石的，庞大的；完全统一的 n. 单块集成电路，单片电路 同义词:enormous, huge, integral, holistic Mathematics is not a single monolithic structure of absolute truth !数学并不是绝对真理的单一整体结构。
n. 偏见；先入之见；预想 同义词:forecast, bias By 12 weeks after delivery , all the parameters returned to preconception values.到产后12周时各项指标均恢复未孕水平。
adj. 好辩的；好争论的；挑起论战的 同义词:argumentative, disputative The letter was probably written for polemical impact .这封信可能是为了造成争论性影响而写的。

adj. 敏捷的，迅速的；立刻的 vt. 提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白 n. 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格 adv. 准时地 同义词:rapid, fast, fly, forward, ready, facilitate, boost, further, cue, noting, punctually What prompted her to be so generous?是什么原因使得她如此大方呢?
vt. 混合；使咬字不清晰；使微醉 n. 糊涂；困惑；混浊状态 vi. 胡乱思考；糊里糊涂地行事 同义词:compound, mix together, confusion, perplexity He has muddled all the arrangements.他打乱了各项安排。
n. 争论；辩论者 adj. 好争论的 同义词:controversy, combat, disputative, litigious His book is part personal memoir, part history and polemic .他的作品集个人回忆、历史记述与观点争鸣于一身。
adj. 干瘪的；枯萎的；消瘦的 v. 枯萎（wizen的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:blasted, emarcid, shriveled She complained of a headache , and she looked old wizened .她说她头痛，看上去显得又衰老又干巴。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量
adj. 沉默的；有保留的；谨慎的 同义词:silent, cautious, mum Interviewers had often tried to sound him out on that war ; he was surprisingly reticent .访谈者常常试探他对这场战争的态度，他却一反常态，保持了沉默。
vt. 使用；行使；挥舞 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, exercise She wields two languages in her office.她在办公室里使用两种语言。

n. 激励；提示；刺激 v. 促进；激起；鼓舞（prompt的ing形式） 同义词:stimulus, incentive, animation, excitement, needle, pushing, facilitating A potentially even more interesting application could involve prompting cloned stem cells to differentiate into cells of the blood and bone marrow .还有一种应用可能更为有趣，这或许和诱导复制干细胞分化成血球与骨髓细胞有关。
n. 飞毛腿；疾行；飘飞的云 vi. 疾行；顺风行驶 同义词:peg The plane scudded over the village.飞机从小村庄上空掠过。

adj. 矛盾的；好恶相克的 同义词:contradictory, conflictive Are you contradictory/ ambivalent now ?你现在是不是很矛盾？
n. 嘟嘟声；号声；巨响 vi. 发嘟嘟声；发出响而刺耳的声音 vt. 嘟嘟地发出；高声发出 同义词:toot, trumpet call, tootle The trumpets blared as the procession got under way.当队伍开始前进时小号发出刺耳的响声。
adj. 每日的；平凡的；每日发作的 n. 每天发生的事；日发疟 同义词:daily, ordinary, stock Most solutions to the problem of global warming are tediously , almost oppressively , quotidian .大多数应对全球变暖的措施都是冗长乏味，几近压制，以及司空见惯的。
vi. 邻接；毗邻；紧靠 vt. 邻接；毗邻；紧靠 同义词:adjoin, neighbor This piece of land abuts on a street.这块土地毗连着一条街。
n. 闹剧；胡闹；笑剧 同义词:slapstick comedy, dido to farce a play with old jokes用陈旧的笑话给戏剧增添趣味
n. 敬礼；尊敬 同义词:respect, worship To her the Mullah obeisance , and, kneeling before her , told his tale .毛拉深鞠一躬，跪在她面前，讲述了自己的故事。
vi. 产生；自然增长或利益增加 vt. 获得；积累 同义词:result, breed, acquire, earn, buy, score, find The interest accrued to our account.我们存款长了利息。
n. 髓，骨髓；精华；活力 同义词:essence, energy, vitality, elite, flower They do know that once the marrow cell undergoes a " leukemic " change , it multiplies into many cells .他们只知道一旦骨髓细胞发生了“白血病性”的变化，就分裂为很多细胞。
vt. 剥夺公民权；剥夺推举议员权 to disfranchise someone of the right to vote剥夺某人选举权

n. 翡翠；[宝] 碧玉；老马 adj. 玉制的；绿玉色的 vi. 疲倦 vt. 使疲倦 同义词:jadite, jasper, weary of, get tired, pooh, poh Painting , porcelain , cloisonne and jade .绘画，瓷器，景泰蓝和玉器。

adj. 流行的；一般的，最普通的；占优势的；盛行很广的 v. 盛行，流行（prevail的现在分词形式）；获胜 同义词:popular, general, fashionable, going, common, winning The frothy levels of government indebtedness prevailing in developed countries are certainly not reassuring .发达国家政府普遍存在的高负债水平，当然不会让人放心。

adj. 绝对的（名词categoricalness，副词categorically，异体字categoric）；直接了当的；无条件的；属于某一范畴的 同义词:strict, absolute, positive, unlimited The overall result is that no categorical statements can be made.整体结论是，我们无法下明确的断言。

adj. 外伤的；创伤的 n. 外伤药 同义词:vulnerary Following exposure to a disaster or traumatic event, children are likely to show signs of stress .在面对灾难或创伤性事件之后，儿童很可能表现出受到压力的迹象。

n. 植物区系；植物群 This nation , famous for its unique fauna and flora , is now allowing applications for the professional export of its protected species to overseas zoological gardens .该国以出产独特动物群和植物群闻名，如今开放专业申请将其保育类动物出口到海外的动物园去。
adj. 华而不实的；俗丽的 n. 盛大宴会 同义词:purple, gingerbready About half past eight I passed by an absurd little theatre , with great flaring gas-jets and gaudy play bills.大约八点半的时候，我从一家可笑的小剧场前走过，那儿有点光亮的煤气灯和俗艳的海报。
adj. 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的 同义词:sceptical, suspicious Even for the champions of reform , it is good to be a bit skeptical .即使在主张和提倡改革的人当中，保留一点怀疑态度也有好处。
adj. 回答的；应答的 n. [法] 被告；应答者 同义词:answering, accused person, indictee respondent was not acting bona fide .被告的行为不真诚。

adj. 有意的；任性的；故意的 同义词:intended, studied, designed, conscious, minded Just yesterday it seems you were a harum -scarum child with dirty hands and a willful heart.就在昨天，你还象个冒失的傻孩子，一双手脏呼呼的，一颗心顽固任性。
adj. 秃顶的；光秃的；单调的；无装饰的 vi. 变秃 同义词:flat, blank, naked The young man was starting to bald rapidly.这个年轻人开始迅速脱发。
n. 獾；獾皮毛 同义词:brock You can't badger me into going to the party.你不能纠缠我去参加聚会。

n. 迫切；急迫，危急；迫近的危险或祸患 同义词:impendence, instancy The imminence of negotiations thus probably spurred rather than delayed his decision .因此，谈判日益逼近这一事实很有可能不是推迟而是促使他下了决心。
n. 悬崖；绝壁；险境 同义词:escarpment, krantz The world has stepped back from the brink , but is still skirting the edge of the precipice .世界已从悬崖边缘后退，但并没有完全脱离绝壁附近的危险地带。
n. 一夫一妻制；[动] 单配偶，[动] 单配性 Shake off your chains of monogamy . You're a free man.抛掉你那一夫一妻制的枷锁吧，你自由了。
adj. 严厉的；迫切的；银根紧的 同义词:severe, tight, hard, harsh, pressing The Clean Water Act expressly provides that it does not preempt more stringent state law .《洁净水法案》明确规定，该法并不先占更为严格的州法律。

n. 对手；敌手 同义词:equal, opponent, comparative, rival, match If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。
adj. 明智的，可取的，适当的 同义词:suitable, wise, adequate, appropriate, proper Stemming advisable because it can sinter and complicate later charging .不宜堵塞炮泥，因为万一炮泥烧结堵死就会使以后的装药工作很麻烦。

n. 独裁政治；专制政治；独裁政府；独裁统治的国家 同义词:monocracy, czarism Their differences lie in the ways of autocracy : should it be a benevolent , open and kind one, or should it be overbearing , wild , and evil ?他们的不同只在于主张怎样的专制：是王道的、开明的、仁慈的专制主义，还是霸道的、野蛮的、邪恶的专制主义？

n. 幕间休息；暂停；中断 同义词:break, hang intermission , let's go out for some fresh air .幕间休息时，我们出去呼吸呼吸新鲜空气吧。

adj. 下垂的，悬垂的；摇摆的 同义词:nutant, droopy So blend the turrets and shadows there that all seems pendulous in air.塔楼阴影交互映衬，一切都似乎高悬空际。

adj. 不屈不挠的；不服输的；不气馁的 同义词:tough, unflagging A great man is one who has a strong will and indomitable spirit .一个成功的人士一定有着坚强的决心和不服输的精神。
n. 迂回说法；折绕 Periphrasis " is one of the main figures of speech in Pushkins poetic novel Evgenii Onegin.（换说）是普希金的诗体小说《叶甫盖尼·奥涅金》使用的主要修辞手段之一。
n. [法] 证词，证言；证据 同义词:proof, witness The prospect of new testimony and additional Cross-examinations soured him still more .重新作证和更多的盘问的前景使他更加苦恼了。

n. 警棍；棍子；权杖 vt. 用警棍打 同义词:stake, night stick The, policeman hit the man once with his truncheon , and he went down like a felled ox .有一次警察用他的警棍打了这个男人，他像一头被击倒的公牛倒了下去。
adj. 伪的；可疑的 同义词:suspicious, doubtful The thing is , they turn out not to be apocryphal .而事实是，这些并非杜撰。
